caption.title: Comparison of two different linear mixed-effects models testing the effect of biological sample type (invaded or control), organism (plant, mammal, mussel), and their interactions, on Shannon diversity index of the environmental microbiome.
caption.p: In Model 1 we included studyID as random factor, while in Model 2 we included both studyID and environment (soil or water) as random factors.
Click here for additional data file.
